item.title: Location
item.author: loos@irsamc.ups-tlse.fr (PTEROSOR)
item.description: The conference will be held in the Auditorium of Le Village near the city center of Toulouse. The address is 31 All√©e Jules Guesde 31000 TOULOUSE. Toulouse is an amazing city with many monuments to visit and food to taste (like cassoulet!). For more info, visit Tourism in Toulouse. Here is a selection of monuments you do not want to miss. Note that there are all within walking distance from the workshop venue:

item.title: Participants
item.author: loos@irsamc.ups-tlse.fr (PTEROSOR)
item.description: List of participants Giuseppe Barca (Australian National University, Australia) Stefano Battaglia (Uppsala U, Sweden) Xavier Blase (Institut Neel, France) Katharina Boguslawski (Nicolaus Copernicus U, Poland) George Booth (King’s College, UK) TBC Andreea Filip (Cambridge, UK) Claudia Filippi (U of Twente, Netherland) Emmanuel Fromager (U of Strasbourg, France) Peter Gill (U of Sydney, Australia) Tim Gould (Griffith U, Australia) TBC Emmanuel Giner (Sorbonne U, France) So Hirata (U of Illinois, US) TBC Joshua Hollett (U of Winnipeg, Canada) Denis Jacquemin (U of Nantes, France) Thomas Jagau (KU Leuven, Belgium) Joohno Lee (Columbia U, US) Eduard Matito (Donostia, Spain) Nick Mayhall (Virginia Tech, US) Eric Neuscamman (Berkeley, US) TBC Kasha Pernal (Lodz U, Poland) Lucia Reining (Polytechnique, France) Pina Romaniello (U of Toulouse, France) Sandeep Sharma (U of Colorado, US) Alexander Sokolov (Ohio State U, US) Alex Thom (Cambridge, UK) Julien Toulouse (Sorbonne U, France) Morgane Vacher (U of Nantes, France) Local organisers The present workshop is organized by members of the Laboratoire de Chimie et Physique Quantiques (Toulouse, France) as part of the ERC PTEROSOR project: Pierre-Francois Loos Amandine Laurent Anthony Scemama Michel Caffarel Fabris Kossoski Raul Quintero Enzo Monino Yann Damour Antoine Marie
